mapper.select: select u.* from sys_user u where u.account=#{account} and u.is_enabled='Y'
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(user_id, account, password, is_account_expired, is_password_expired, is_locked, is_enabled, created_user_id, created_user, created_date, created_ip)values(#{id}, #{account}, #{password}, 'N', 'N', 'N', 'Y', #{created_user_id}, #{created_user_id}, #{created_date}, #{created_ip})
